I don't have access to the code right now, but I was wondering if I was missing how to remove talents in Rawr 3?

My holy paladin is 51/5/15, I want to see how he'd do at 51/2/18.  However, I can't figure out a way to take the 3 points out of Protection without creating the talent spec from scratch.  Right clicking brings up a generic Silverlight menu.
Yeah, it's... shift-clicking, I think? Might be alt-clicking? One of the modifiers acts as right-click for almost everything in Rawr3.
Aha, it was shift clicking.  I thought I tried that, guess not.  Thanks. :)
